00019 BlockReader::BlockReader()
00020 {
00021     reset();
00022 }
00023 
00024 BlockReader::BlockReader(int iBlockSize)
00025 {
00026     reset();
00027     m_iWindowSize = iBlockSize;
00028 }

00031 {

00035 void BlockReader::reset()
00036 {
00037     m_iWindowSize = 50;   // # of samples/columns to scan horizontally per window
00038     m_iWindowOffset = -1; // not loaded first sample in window
00039     m_iSampleIndex = -1;  // not loaded, first sample in blob
00040 
00041     m_vProbeSets.clear();
00042 }
00043 
00044 bool BlockReader::isReadNextWindow(int iSampleIndex)
00045 {
00046     if (m_iWindowOffset == -1) {
00047         return true; // first window not loaded
00048     }
00049     if (iSampleIndex >= (m_iWindowOffset + m_iWindowSize)) {
00050         return true; // exceeds window limit, load next window
00051     }
00052     return false;
00053 }
00054 
00055 bool BlockReader::readNextWindow()
00056 {
00057     clearErrMsg();
00058 
00059     if (!isOpen()) {
00060         setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next window, reader not opened.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00061         return false;
00062     }
00063 
00064     if (m_fileHandle == NULL) {
00065         setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next window, file handle is invalid.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00066         return false;
00067     }
00068 
00069     if (!seekToFirstProbeSet()) {
00070         setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next windw, unable to seek to first probeset.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", ErrMsg: " + getErrMsg());
00071         return false;
00072     }
00073 
00074     int iNextWindowOffset = (m_iWindowOffset < 0 ? 0 : m_iWindowOffset + m_iWindowSize);
00075     IndexTable& indexTable = m_indexReader.getIndexTable();
00076     m_vProbeSets.clear();
00077     m_vProbeSets.reserve(indexTable.getCount());
00078     for (int i = 0; i < indexTable.getCount(); i++) {
00079         IndexRow& row = indexTable.at(i);
00080         SampleList vSamples;
00081         if (!readNextWindowBlock(vSamples, row.getNumAlleles(), iNextWindowOffset, m_iWindowSize)) {
00082             setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next windw, unable to read next sample block.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", ErrMsg: " + getErrMsg());
00083             return false;
00084         }
00085         m_vProbeSets.push_back(make_pair(row, vSamples));
00086     }
00087 
00088     // move offset to next window of samples
00089     m_iWindowOffset = iNextWindowOffset;
00090 
00091     return true;
00092 }
00093 
00094 bool BlockReader::nextSample()
00095 {
00096     if (!isOpen()) {
00097         return false;
00098     }
00099 
00100     m_iSampleIndex++;
00101     if (0 <= m_iSampleIndex && m_iSampleIndex < getNumSamples()) {
00102         if (isReadNextWindow(m_iSampleIndex)) {
00103             return readNextWindow();
00104         }
00105         return true;
00106     }
00107 
00108     return false;
00109 }
00110 
00111 string BlockReader::getSampleName()
00112 { 
00113     if (0 <= m_iSampleIndex && m_iSampleIndex < getNumSamples()) {
00114         return getSampleNames()[m_iSampleIndex]; 
00115     }
00116     return "";
00117 }
00118 
00119 string BlockReader::getSampleCall(SampleList& vSamples)
00120 {
00121     bool bSampleInBlobRange = (0 <= m_iSampleIndex && m_iSampleIndex < getNumSamples());
00122     bool bSampleInWindowRange = (m_iWindowOffset <= m_iSampleIndex && m_iSampleIndex <= (m_iWindowOffset + m_iWindowSize));
00123     if (bSampleInBlobRange && bSampleInWindowRange) {
00124         int iWindowIndex = (m_iSampleIndex % m_iWindowSize);
00125         if (0 <= iWindowIndex && iWindowIndex < vSamples.getCount()) {
00126             uint8_t byCallCode = vSamples[iWindowIndex].getCall();
00127             //
00128             // todo: should use CallCode table in IndexHeader section instead
00129             //
00130             switch (byCallCode) {
00131                 case 6: return "A/A";
00132                 case 7: return "B/B";
00133                 case 8: return "A/B";
00134                 case 11: return "NoCall";
00135                 case 12: return "OTV";
00136                 default: return "NoCall";
00137             }
00138         }
00139         else {
00140             setErrMsg("Failed to extract call from sample for probeset, window index is out of range.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", WindowIndex: " + Convert::toString(iWindowIndex) + ", SamplesInWindow: " + Convert::toString(vSamples.getCount()));
00141             return "NoCall";
00142         }
00143     }
00144     else {
00145         setErrMsg("Failed to extract call from sample for probeset, sample index is out of range.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", SampleIndex: " + Convert::toString(m_iSampleIndex) + ", NumSamples: " + Convert::toString(getNumSamples()) + ", WindowOffset: " + Convert::toString(m_iWindowOffset) + ", WindowSize: " + Convert::toString(m_iWindowSize));
00146         return "NoCall";
00147     }
00148 }
